actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey to the city of Wabasha, Minnesota, certain real property in exchange for other property located in Wabasha, Minnesota.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to convey to the city of Wabasha, Minnesota all land and improvements comprising the United States Army Reserve Center, Wabasha, Minnesota. Requires such city to convey to the United States specified lands in consideration for such conveyance.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey to the city of Wabasha, Minnesota, certain real property in exchange for other property located in Wabasha, Minnesota.
